mapper.update: update ticket set ticket_status = 2 where ticket_code = ${ticketCode}
update ticket set ticket_status = 1 where ticket_code = ${ticketCode}
mapper.select: select ticket_code, ticket_price, ticket_image1, ticket_image2, ticket_ott_no , ticket_month, ticket_status, ticket_no from ticket where ticke_code = ${ticketCode}

select t.ticket_code, t.ticket_price, t.ticket_image1, t.ticket_image2, t.ticket_ott_no, t.ticket_month, t.ticket_status, t.ticket_no, o.ott_name, o.ott_image, o.ott_cd from ticket t left join ottkind o on t.ticket_ott_no = o.ott_no order by t.ticket_no desc

select * from (rownum rn ticket.* (select ticket_code, ticket_price, ticket_image1, ticket_image2, ticket_ott_no , ticket_month, ticket_status ,ticket_no from ticket order by ticket_no desc)ticket) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select distinct ticket_month from ticket order by ticket_month asc
